title: Dashboard Visual Enhancements
description: Today's goal is now visually separated and completed items show strikethrough and muted color.

title: Fix: Goal Completion Sync
description: Resolved a bug where completed goal state did not persist on page reload.

title: Tone Preview Picker
description: Users can preview tone-specific ping messages in Pro settings.

title: Push Notifications Enhanced
description: Now includes sound on ping delivery and improved reliability with new VAPID logic.

title: Change Log Page
description: Public-facing change log now available with badges and filters.

title: Gravatar Integration
description: User avatars are now displayed via Gravatar on the dashboard.

title: Fix: Duplicate Notifications
description: Resolved an issue where pings were sent twice via email and push.

title: Subtasks with Completion Tracking
description: You can now check off subtasks from the dashboard and have them saved.

title: Sub-task Completion Tracking
description: Users can now check off sub-tasks from the dashboard and have them persist.

title: Fix: Duplicate Push & Email
description: Resolved issue where duplicate notifications were sent on some pings.

title: Launched Weekly Summary Emails
description: Weekly performance summaries are now emailed to Pro users.

title: Built PWA Install Flow
description: App can now be installed as a Progressive Web App (PWA) for desktop and mobile.

title: Added Web Push Notifications
description: Users can now receive ping reminders via browser notifications.

title: PWA + Installable App
description: DailyPing is now installable as a Progressive Web App (PWA)!

title: Started Pro Features
description: Initial implementation of Pro features like scheduled pings, tones, and timezone settings.
